content:
Hey everyone,
I can help/demo the HSPC Sandbox CDS hooks functionality, but I will be in several different tracks supporting the sandbox. Message me if you want help and I'll get to you when I can. Thanks!

Very excited to see CDS Hooks support in the HSPC Sandbox! Are there plans to add an authorization token in the discovery endpoint request? Right now our services are set to return a 401 if there's not a recognized auth token present (per the spec)

Very excited to see CDS Hooks support in the HSPC Sandbox! Are there plans to add an authorization token in the discovery endpoint request? Right now our services are set to return a 401 if there's not a recognized auth token present (per the spec)

Right now the HSPC Sandbox assumes it's receiving an open endpoint. I would like to meet with you and maybe we can think through a good workflow to get something useful implemented. Let's plan to meet after lunch.
Can't seem to run my CDS hook, has anyone been able to successfully test their cds hook on HSPC?
